ocean.question: I have a mouth but cannot eat. I have a bed but never sleep. I run, but I have no feet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water.
🚢 Boats float on me.
🌊 I'm very, very big.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.
🐌 I am a type of mollusk.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean and breathes through a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🎶 I can sing songs.
🐋 I am the largest animal on Earth.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs and is known for my orange and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in anemones.
🎬 You might have seen me in a movie.
🤡 My pattern helps me hide.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink! What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am very smart.
🔵 I can change color to blend in.
🧱 I don't have any bones.

ocean.question: I am a giant underwater mountain range. What am I?

hints.text: 🌋 They are formed by volcanoes.
📏 They are longer than any mountain range on land.
🏔️ They exist under all oceans.

ocean.question: I am a strong, swirling current in the Atlantic Ocean that affects the weather in Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I carry warm water.
➡️ I move from the Gulf of Mexico.
💨 I influence wind patterns.

ocean.question: I am a large group of tiny plants that float in the ocean and produce much of the Earth's oxygen. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am the base of the ocean food web.
🌞 I use photosynthesis to make food.
🔬 I am microscopic.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean, a very dark and mysterious place. What am I?

hints.text: 📍 I'm in the western Pacific Ocean.
🏔️ The Challenger Deep is located here.
🔦 Very few creatures can survive my pressure.

ocean.question: I am a long, underwater wave caused by earthquakes or other disturbances. I can cause great damage when I reach the shore. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 The word means 'harbor wave' in Japanese.
⚠️ I am sometimes mistakenly called a tidal wave.
🌎 I can travel across entire oceans.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I'm a very large animal.
🥜 I'm often seen in a circus.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow,' like to chase mice, and purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I am a common house pet.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with string.

animal.question: I have a wet nose and wag my tail. I love to fetch sticks. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I am known as man's best friend.
🏡 I live in a kennel or dog house.
🗣️ I bark to communicate.

animal.question: I quack and waddle, and I love to swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🐥 I start as a duckling.
🌾 I eat bread crumbs.
🌧️ I enjoy being in the rain.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I'm known as the King of the Jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a golden mane.
🍖 I'm a carnivore.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots, and I have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat vegetables.
🐇 I am known for being fast.
🌱 I often live in a burrow.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each individual.
🌍 I live on the African savanna.
🐎 I am related to horses and donkeys.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.
🌳 I use my long neck to reach high branches.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and sometimes hiss. I can be venomous or harmless. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I am a reptile with scales.
🐭 I eat rodents and small animals.
🥚 I hatch from eggs.

animal.question: I live in the ocean, I have eight arms, and sometimes squirt ink. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🌊 I use jet propulsion to move quickly.
🧠 I am considered a very intelligent sea creature.
